titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Naomi Allen Paper on the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100 WAG.295

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-07-17T16:00-0400

change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

did.unittitle: Naomi Allen Paper on the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Records contain materials relating to Naomi Allen's involvement with the Local 100 of the Transport Workers Union of America in the 1990s.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Naomi Allen Paper on the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100; WAG 295; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Naomi Allen are held by Naomi Allen. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which she holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Naomi Allen.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Naomi Allen sent a gift of her papers relating to the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100 in 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 1985.005.

controlaccess.corpname: Transport Workers Union of America. Local 100.
